Package net.nightwhistler.htmlspanner.handlers

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FontHandler
    Handler for font-tags
    HeaderHandler
    Handles Headers, by assigning a relative text-size.
    ImageHandler
    Handles image tags.
    LinkHandler
    Creates clickable links.
    ListItemHandler
    Handles items in both numbered and unordered lists.
    MonoSpaceHandler
    Sets monotype font.
    NewLineHandler
    Adds a specified number of newlines.
    PreHandler
    Handles pre tags, setting the style to monospace and preserving the formatting.
    StyledTextHandler
    TagNodeHandler for any type of text that may be styled using CSS.
    StyleNodeHandler
    TagNodeHandler that reads
